general.headline: iOS Developer at Cybercom Creation
general.school: GLS Institute of Computer Technology (MCA Program) (SFI)-Ahmedabad 509
general.description:
I love how iOS programming allows me to create useful and otherwise non-existent services and features on a device that is more and more ubiquitous to people everyday. Programming everyday, I also get to see tangible progress and results in what I'm doing and that is both motivating and an awesome experience for me. 
The challenge of adding even the tiniest detail in functionality or thinking of the best possible user experience for an app or view is what I wake up for everyday. 
And conceptualizing ideas to make apps even more unique and functional is such a rush and something that I've always wanted in a career. 
Every day I think of different aesthetics or unique functionality that I'd like to incorporate into my next app and the opportunity just doesn't come soon enough! 

TECHNICAL SKILLS:

Languages: Java (advanced),swift(advanced),SQL (advanced), PHP (advanced), Objective-C (advanced), C/C++ (familiar), Javascript (familiar), HTML (familiar), CSS (familiar),React-native(familiar),Agularjs(familiar).

Databases: Oracle, MySQL, MangoDB.

SDKs: Android, iOS, Google Maps and Facebook SDK’s.

Tools: Eclipse, Github, Vim, Xcode, Sublime, phpStorm.

Strong people skills and a knack for problem solving.
Ability to maintain composure and customer focus while troubleshooting and solving technical issues.
Ability to adhere to a schedule of customer appointments.

Since inception, we are proud to have established strong relationships with companies from all over the globe, including blue-chip firms, SMEs, Venture Capitalist firms, as well as start-ups.

jobs.description:
Serving IT & Non-IT firms as a HR Consultant. Focusing on implementing HR Practices at client location. 

My core responsibility is to empower and support HRD at client organizations and help them in achieving business goals. HRP, Recruitment, Policy Implementation, Organization Culture Assessment and Improvement, Managing Employee Engagement Activities, Learning & Development, etc are managed by me and my team members.

Handling end-to-end recruitment & selection process for different division.
Understand the position, client and the industry domain completely.
Sourcing relevant profiles through different sources, Head Hunting, Cold Calling, Networking, Referrals.
Conducting Primary Interviews through Face to Face, Skype or Telephonic, Feedback and Selection list.
Candidate Management
Generating offer.
Maintaining as well as preparing reports.
Ensuring proper co-ordination between division heads and the candidates.

• Understanding specific requirements of the required job function from clients.
• Getting detailed specifications about the requirement.
• Analysis of hiring trend & process from client’s end
• In-depth assessment/analysis of client’s requirement.
• Handling Talent hiring on wide range of skill-sets and the positions i.e., middle to senior management levels.

general.school: Sikkim Manipal University of Health, Medical and Technological Sciences
general.description:
Having 6+ Years of Working Experience as a HR Professional.
Involved in full recruiting life cycle & end  to end recruitment of technical and non technical recruitment in IT/Software Development Services Industry.
Understanding resource requirements and deciding on the recruitment strategy.
Interacting with the delivery head on regular basis and prioritizing requirements..
Arranging for technical panels and coordinating at all levels of Interviews 
Conducting interviews to check the candidate’s suitability for the requirement.
Providing timely feedback to the Delivery Head , Management, HR Head on the requirements and to the candidates on their interview.
Conducting induction for new joiners to create awareness of the Recruitment function, HR Policy, Team Introduction, Core Team Introduction. 
Preparing and maintaining various Reports like Tracker sheet, requirement and offer reports, and Various HR reports to be sent to delivery heads and top management. 
Documentation of reports with regards to PF,TDS etc
Organizing employee engagement programs, employee safety, welfare, wellness and health programs
Ensure the payroll process is done on time with the help of accounts department ,taking care of salary a/c opening process, salary grievance management, compensation and benefits administration.
Ensure that confirmation and appraisal are concluded on time.
Involved in complete exit process.

Career Goal - To find a position where I can grasp change and make the best of it for my employer and myself professionally.

jobs.description:
1. Recruitment and selection

a.Coordinates and liaises with prospective employees and for their candidature for various profiles and interview schedules.
b·Conduct interviews at first level to shortlist.
·Coordinate with interviewer panel for taking and interviews and finalizing candidates.
c.Coordinate with PMs and other management members to understand recruitment requirements
d·Figure out various effective channels of recruitment and build network to ensure the same.
e·Prepare letter of offer to selected candidates and letter of rejection to unsuccessful candidates.

2.Training and development

a. Plan Induction for new employees
b.Liaise with respective members of management to ensure proper induction of employees is done based on their designation and role within the organization.

3. Compensation, appraisals and benefits

a.Ensure that appraisals are initiated and done on time
b.Liaise with appraisee and appraiser to ensure proper appraisal process.Issuing appraisal Letter after coordinating with management.
c.Ensure that salaries are done on time and salary related issue of employees is resolved by management on time.
d.Coordinating with Banks for Salary A/c opening and related issues.

4. HR Administration

a.Welcome the visitors and prospective candidates being the face of organization
b.Maintain proper profiles of all the employees and keep a track of their improvements, training needs, acquired skills etc.
c.Ensure  payroll process is done timely and properly with Account Person.
d.Keep track of leaves, holidays, attendance which is again a part of payroll only.

5. HR Management

a.Being a point of contact for employees to share their dissatisfaction and complains and further communicate the same to the management to ensure their problems are resolve.

1.Recruitment - Handling Overall Recruitment Cycle. Coordinating with CE and IT Colleges for Campus Placement, Headhunting.

2.Induction- Formal and Smooth Induction to New Joiners through PPT.Introduction to Management, Current Departments, Rules & Regulations.

3.Training & Development - Arranging Training sessions for Employees, Trainees, and New Joiners as per Company’s Requirement.

4.Performance Appraisal - Helping management in appraisals on basis of overall performance of an employee 

5.Salary & Administration - Oversees Salary Computation. Maintaining Attendance /Leave Records, Administration works.

1.Overall Recruitment Process
      

    2.Client Coordination, Candidate Coordination.
      

    
      3.Scrutiny, Scheduling Interviews, Joining, Negotiations, Revenue Collection.

jobs.description:
IMS is an innovative staffing and recruitment firm whose customized services help individual companies and staffing firms’ source talent for opportunities at home and abroad. We tailor our international and domestic services to each client’s needs by providing traditional recruitment services and creative, one-time solutions that help companies gain advantage in their market.
Our international experience and staffing industry expertise are backed by our ISO 9001:2008 certification and commitment to making your opportunities for people, possible.

Forward Looking
To achieve global recognition for continuous innovation that provides clients with powerful staffing solutions and drives their human resources value chain.

Offshore Recruitment Services – Staffing organizations in different countries use our offshore recruitment and operations support services to fill more orders and reduce internal costs.

With years of experience in the Australian recruitment market, IMS offers the expertise, talent, ability and can-do attitude to source the best candidates and provide the best service to our clients. Our Australian Recruitment Division services clients within multiple sectors, including mining, building and construction, accounting, nonprofit, disability services, IT, engineering, banking and finance, and oil and energy, to name a few!
